name: Stratum
description:
This project was made by me for Pastel Jam 2018. Though the game was originally intended to be a 3D platformer, the necessary coding turned out to be too much for me to do all in one weekend (on top of the art, animation, character models, etc.). However, I felt like Stratum was too beautiful not to show the world. 

In this simple game, you take on the role of Zillian, an alien who's been stranded on a meteorite. She needs to collect 3 crystals to repair her ship so she can go home. Though you can collect the crystals, there is technically no end-screen. 

I will probably do more work with this project -- I love Zillian too much to abandon her. I am uploading this current version for the sake of getting my project in on time for the Pastel Jam. 

The download file is called Lustrum, but it is all the same game. When I started my Pastel Jam project, I wasn't sure what I wanted the final game to be called. Hence why some Stratum files are titled "Lustrum".
